    Exercises

    JdeRobot-Academy is an open source collection of exercises to learn robotics in a practical way. Gazebo simulator is the main tool required, as ROS.

    3D Reconstruction

    The objective of this practice is to program the necessary logic to allow kobuki robot to generate a 3D reconstruction of the scene.

    Autonomous robot control in the Amazon Warehouse

    The objective of this practice is to implement the autonomous navigation and pick-and-place logic.

    Robot self-localization using particle filter and laser sensor

    The objective of this practice is to implement the logic that allows a robot to self locate in space.

    Autoparking

    The objective of this practice is to implement the logic of a navigation algorithm for an automated vehicle.

    Bump and go

    The objective of this practice is to program a basic behaviour of bump-spin using a finite state machine.

    Car Junction

    The objective of this practice is to implement the logic of a navigation algorithm for an automated vehicle.

    Color Filter

    The objective of this practice is to develop a color filter that allow us to segment some object in the image.

    Follow Face

    The objective of this practice is to segment the faces of people and follow them through a camera connected by USB to your computer.

    Visual follow-line behavior on a Formula1

    The objective of this practice is to perform a PID reactive control capable of following the line painted on the racing circuit.

    Global navigation of a TeleTaxi

    The objective of this practice is to implement the logic of a Gradient Path Planning (GPP) algorithm.

    Local navigation of a Formula1 with VFF

    The objective of this practice is to implement the logic of the VFF navigation algorithm.

    Qualifying Formula1

    The objective of this practice is to program a Formula1 to complete a lap to the NÃ¼rburgring circuit as fast as it can.

    Vacuum-cleaner

    The objective of this practice is to implement the logic of a navigation algorithm for an autonomous vacuum.
